message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to pay $85 for the product.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to meet me halfway.  While $105 is closer, I'm still hoping to get it for $90.  It's the absolute most I can afford right now.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm really hoping to get this product for $95.  That's the absolute highest I can go.
Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'll sell the product to you for $102.50.
